name: MojiQuest
description:
Quest with iMessage! Play right inside the Messages app in the brand-new unique social game experience. Adventure with your besties to win loot and become a legend in the fantasy land of Moji, battling monsters and solving puzzles by working together - but make sure you come out on top!

Collect and upgrade items to use on quests, winning experience by beating monsters and high scores. Complete quests to hoard your loot and open chests. level up to unlock more challenging areas and bring your friends along to help!

Features
- Play right within the Messages app for the most social gameplay experience on mobile
- Quest together with friends to become a legend in the Moji fantasy world
- Battle monsters and win encounters to get XP and level up, unlocking new items and quests
- Play quests in as many message groups as you like, every one helping you to progress
- Earn chests to collect powerful new items and upgrade your collection
- Created for iOS 10

Emoji art supplied by http://emojione.com
